tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting this clinic for the past 5 yrs, doctor has been treating both my son and daughter who are twins and now 10 yrs old. What I like most about the doctor  is that he is very compassionate and kind.  Always makes sure kids are given proper time to settle down before starting the treatment.  Clinic is equipped with all the gadgets for the kids to get distracted during the procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I took appointment  for my nephew who had severe toothache for the past 7 days.  With very patience and kindness Dr removed the infected tooth.  I could see my nephew smiling after the procedure was done. Very happy the experience,  and cudos to the doctor and his team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting  this clinic  for the past 8yrs. Braces for my daughter was done by Dr pathak and I am very happy  with the result  that we achieved. Finally I gathered  courage to do teeth straightening  for myself.  Aligners was suggested, and I started wearing  them. Today was my final appointment,  it took 5 months. I am very happy  with results that I got. All the gaps in my teeth are closed. Dr pathak is very professional , kind and soft spoken. All the staffs are very responsible .

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Nice Doctor couple, Dr Rohini and Dr Anuj  are very kind and polite.  I'm one of the first  patient of doctors. Very happy with the treatment done.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My family had been visiting  this clinic for the past few years. Dr is very kind hearted and polite.   Writes very few medications, always stresses to take less of antibiotics or any other medications.  He always explains  the issue and how it could have been  prevented.  By looking  at the condition of my father in law's oral cavity he could diagnose that he is diabetic, later on report came positive.  For any dental and oral infection I recommend sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dental implant  was done for me by Dr anuj.  I'm usually  very scared of dental treatments,  after my wife had implants placed I made up my mind to do my implants as well.  Dr did a very good job. Entire  process was almost painless.  Support staff were equally supportive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very much satisfied with the treatment recieved in this clinic.  Doctor and his clinic are well equipped.  Staffs are very helpful and supportive.

review: Underwent wisdom tooth extraction.  Doctor could sense that i was very nervous  at the beginning,  so himself  and the staffs were constantly  making me feel comfortable. Apart from slight pain from the prick of injection,  treatment  was painless only.   All thanks to Dr and his team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My kids milk teeth did not go away and permanent teeth had started to come up. The doctor operated ut seamlessly and my kid could not feel any pain and know that his teeth has been taken out. Highly recommended to anyone.  Thanks for the wonderful treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Tooth and gums for my 4 year old daughter 's tooth decay issues. We visited several clinics before and did not get satisfactory suggestions. However when we visited Dr Anuj , we were highly impressed of his explaination of the problem in depth and his friendliness with my daughter. My daughter who cried in all the previous clinics, was so happy to talk to Dr. Anuj. Even the other staff members are very loving towards the child. They have kept a lot of stuff to keep kid's happy and occupied. The treatment was also well planned and nicely executed.While many previous dentists suggested root canal for my daughter without even properly examining the teeth(daughter was petrified to open mouth because of pretended friendliness of previous dentists) , but Dr Anuj examined thoroughly with patience and recommended capping and filling for the affected tooth. We went for several sittings but Dr. Anuj and his staff was always very kind, friendly and patient with the child. It was a painless , friendly and thorough treatment and we would highly recommend Dr. Anuj for any dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My 8 yr old son who is very scared  of doctors and injections, needed to remove few of his milk teeth, we had visited lot of dentists previously  but most of them were not able to give injection.  Dr pathak is very calm and composed,  also sympathetic  and friendly  to kids,  and I must day quite persuasive. He could convince my son for the injection. Afterwards  the treatment  was done very quickly,  very happy with the way my son was treated  by the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My 10 yr old daughter had few  mobile teeth and were  troubling her for the past few months. she was very scared to get it removed. Dr pathak made the procedure look so easy. some gel was applied after which she didn't feel the pain of injection. Few minutes later tooth was removed without any pain and discomfort. I'm very happy with the way she was treated in this clinic, so is she.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The dental treatment for my toddler was excellent. The dentist and the staff were all very kind and patient with my child, making sure he felt comfortable throughout the entire process. The office was clean and child-friendly, with toys and books in the waiting area to keep my toddler occupied. The dentist thoroughly explained the treatment plan and answered all of my questions. The actual dental procedure was quick and efficient, with minimal discomfort for my child. I highly recommend this dental practice for kids dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The dental treatment received for my toddler was excellent. The dentist and staff were very gentle and patient with my child, making them feel comfortable and at ease throughout the entire procedure. The office had a child-friendly environment which helped distract and reassure my toddler during the examination. The dentist explained the treatment process in a way that my child could understand, ensuring that they felt involved and well-informed. Overall, I am very satisfied with the dental treatment my toddler received.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm a doctor, doing internship  from a reputed government  medical college of kolkata.  The treatment done was for my mother,  who is 65 Yr old and  had lots of mobile  teeth and receding gums.  Doctor planned for full mouth  denture followed by complete  denture , we were apprehensive  initially.  But the result  is awesome,  the dentures are perfect fit and she able to chew properly.  I and my whole family  is so happy  to see my mother smiling  again.  Thank you so much.  There are so many thing to learn from you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I stay in Madrid and have come to kolkata for my sisters  wedding,  and would be leaving  day after tmrw.  I needed a root canal treatment that too in one sitting.  Inspite of turning without appointment  dr pathak agreed to take up my case  and did single sitting root canal treatment.  The procedure took 2 hrs but he made sure I was comfortable ( played the music on TV which I love)   throughout  the treatment.  The clinic is very neat and clean and the staffs were very supportive.  Analgesics  was also given to me . I am very happy  with experience  here in this clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had this ulcer on side of my tongue for the past 1 week, which was really  painful.  I was not able to eat or drink anything  for the past 1 week.  Also I was very scared  after searching  the symptoms that I read on Internet. Dr pathak is a thorough  gentleman,  he was very calm and made me understand  the problem  that I had.  Through laser he did some treatment  which made the pain instantly  disappear  , also few medications and gel were prescribed which I have already  started.  I'm very much happy with overall experience  here at teeth and gums dental clinic.  All the staff were equally  supportive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My 5r old daughter had been suffering from lot of cavities for the past 3 yr, and would never eat any solid food. All the foods that i used to give her mashed. Dr pathak suggested a customized treatment plan for her, which included fillings and crowns. It took 4 to 5 appointments to finish the entire treatment. Now she eats all the solid foods, in fact we have started giving her nuts. I'm really thankful to Dr pathak , and would definitely recommend him to any other kid in need of dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently had dental treatment at teeth  and gums dental clinic and I couldn't  be happier with the outcome. The treatment  was carried  out with great skill and profession, leaving  me with excellent  results. I highly  recommend Dr pathak , for his top notch service and exceptional dental care.

review: Very much satisfied  with the treatment  recieved  in this clinic, my family had been undergoing  dental treatment here for quite  few years now and all of them are happy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I really  loved the way doctor take  care of kids, 2 filling was done for my son.  My son who was very scared onthe 1st, came out of the clinic smiling and laughing.

My son had deep cavity and had to do RCT. Doctor made the treatment very seamless and painless for him. My son was kept busy by diverting his attention to cartoons while his treatment was being done. There were no cries and howling as most mothers fear and post the treatment also it was quite smooth for him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

After several  appointment  we could finish  the entire treatment  which included pulpectomies  and crowns.  Very happy with the outcome.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Anuj Sir is very patient with kids. My son was just 4 and was very scared when we went for the first time. He is having lot of problem in his teeth, Sir always suggests a treatment which last for longer time. I remember my son doesnt use to sleep whole night due to toothache, got his pulpectomy done and its been 3 years now he is not facing any problem.  Thank you sir for handling my son and treating him.
